website_summaries.verdict: Not as supportive as traditional Tevas, but straps keep sandals on feet better than standard flip-flops.
pros: Comes in hazel,  chocolate-scuba blue (Zappos), pana chocolate, pana purple, zaro purple (Zappos and Amazon), black, and zaro black-silver (Amazon)
EVA topsoles and midsoles with enhanced arch support
cons: Not as easy to slip on as a regular flip flop

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why these say boys because they are definitely girls. They do run a little small, my daughter wears size 13 usually, but size 1 fit her perfectly. Love the plastic bottom that is more sturdy than plain flip flops. This is my daughter's 2nd pair as she loves this style and feels they're very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H

customer_reviews.title: Teva candles are great!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes these flip-flops. They are stylish and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Momofonesweetie

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke after only 1 month. Very disappointing. ...
customer_reviews.text: Strap broke after only 1 month. Very disappointing. These were given to her on her birthday April 30th and they broke May 30th. We have had Teva sandals and they usually last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy shoe fits well and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Hard to find style. Purchased them for a girl. Have held up to lots of outside play so far. Appear to be unisex or even more on the feminine side.
customer_reviews.author: Prospect

customer_reviews.title: Size down
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter, she fits into a size 6 adult. I figured these might be a little big for her, but they are sadly more than a little big. I usually wear a women's size 7.5 or 8 a d they're a little big on me. Cute though, seem good quality, I would just size down if I were to purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Correia

customer_reviews.title: These fit perfectly! They are smaller than the girls’ ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly! They are smaller than the girls’ size 4 I got in another pattern. This fits much more appropriately! Extremely comfy! Wish others were same price! Outstanding referral matched my personal experience with my purchase. Friend said these were “the most comfy sandals she’s ever purchased and they are with every penny!” She is most definitely, correct.
customer_reviews.author: 2manyhobbies1869

customer_reviews.title: Cute Thongs!
customer_reviews.text: I love these thongs. I recently learned that a child's size 6 is the same as an adult woman's size 8 so I am loving the ability to wear this type of really cute kids sandals! Why didn't I know this years ago?
customer_reviews.author: Evierose

customer_reviews.title: Broken Tevas
customer_reviews.text: This style of flip -flop is a favorite of mine. I have 3 girls and each of us have at least one pair. That being said, my daughter has only had hers since 4/20. It is now 6/11 and one of the straps has come out of the sole. They are completely unusable. The return window is now closed. I will be contacting Teva directly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The design and color combination are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The design and color combination are perfect for everyday wear. I can't speak on how comfortable these would be for extended wear, but for beach and pool use they are ideal. Like most flip flops, I'd proceed with caution on certain pool decks (they tend to be slippery). Overall a great sandal!
customer_reviews.author: M. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable better than a flip flop
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable. Slight arch support. Don't fall off feet like a typical flip flop, but not as easy to slip into as a flip flop. Overall, my daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Zma

customer_reviews.title: she’s not into pink or purple shoes and these looked nice on her
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter, she’s not into pink or purple shoes and these looked nice on her. She’s a 3 in girls and I bought a 3 and they fit perfectly. She says they’re very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I have the adult version and my niece thought she needed some, so perfect for her birthday. She loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Tevas!
customer_reviews.text: These are labeled as "boys'" but my daughter loves these - she wears them everyday! The color could definitely be boy/girl. Love Tevas!!!
customer_reviews.author: Claire S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Working well for our 11 year old, and I bought a pair for my MIL also as she liked them when she saw the daughter's!
customer_reviews.author: DoriGR

customer_reviews.title: Not a boys flip flop.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughter and she loves them. They fit her well.
customer_reviews.author: Cindylou82

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not durable
customer_reviews.text: They are cute on my daughter and she loves them but they broke already. Her old pair of Teva flip flops didn't fair any better. We should have stuck with the LLBean ones she had last year
customer_reviews.author: 802i

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Loved the sandal 100%, but, did not fit as expected. Will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Jensen

customer_reviews.title: We loved the look of the straps for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: We loved the look of the straps for my daughter. Yet, maybe since it was a boy's shoe it didn't fit her. The girls shoe fit great.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cashen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these flops. The fit well and look good with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Cynowa

customer_reviews.title: but I ordered a 4 and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yo. daughter usually wears a size 3, but I ordered a 4 and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MotherTucker

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Straps Stretch and Foot Slides off Front of Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for myself since I wear wide width shoes and have problems finding flip flops for women in my size (7 wide - extra wide.) I may have ordered these a bit big (should have gotten a 5.5 youth, but they only had whole sizes.) They fit ok to begin with, but the straps are pretty flimsy and have stretched - my foot now slides off the front end of the shoe. I can't decide if I should order down or just find something else (afraid this would happen with the straps, no matter what the size.) I likely will just look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cute and my daughter loved them, but one of the straps broke after a month. :(
customer_reviews.author: Claire Broome

customer_reviews.title: Thank you !
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect ! Arrived when expected and ordering a 2nd pair.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Zim

customer_reviews.title: With the added straps they are more comfortable for play and everyday wear than regular flip flops
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 9 year old Grandgirl. She loves them. With the added straps they are more comfortable for play and everyday wear than regular flip flops. They are also lake friendly, so an added plus. She normally wears a 2 1/2 so we ordered the 3, and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: LEversole

customer_reviews.title: Love these. I am adult woman's 6
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I am adult woman's 6.5 and I order a childs size 5. The childs are wider than the adult in these and the adults are too tight for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Nelson
